title: #BecauseMiami: A Zoo Car
description:
NBC national political reporter Marc Caputo joins the show to talk about the conservative Spanish radio station that is replacing 790 the Ticket in Miami. But before that, a lot of local items to get to...including the possibility of Joe Carollo finally getting what's coming to him.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
